channel.title: Massacred World, Unique Features. [UPDATED MONKEY GREEGREE]
channel.description:
[font=impact][size=28pt][b]Massacred World[/b][/size][/font] [b]I know i already posted this, but that was more of advertisement. This is a development.[/b]
[size=14pt][b]MONKEY GREEGREE VID! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wHWIQTkgq44[/b][/size]
[b]MAIN INFO:[/b] In this server, i wanted to make the most perfect private server with things that hopefully, [b]NO OTHER SERVERS HAVE[/b], and i was hoping to attract people to my server with several things that only [b]Massacred World[/b] can boast. I've attempted to perfect the combat and even though i know it isnt [b]EXACTLY runescapes[/b], i personally think [b]its pretty close[/b].
Ive improved the combat by changing timers, [b]and improving the maxhit formulae for all formulae already added[/b], making defence and slash bonuses actually apply correctly.
Not only these features, but [b]ive fixed out almost every single bug[/b], and all that are found are instantly removed.
[b]PJ TIMER INFO:[/b] You are now unable to PJ anyone who is fighting someone else, but you are able to attack people that are attacking people that aren't attacking back. stopping meanies.
[size=12pt]14TH MAY: FIXED A NEVER BEFORE FOUND DUPE, ADDED MONKEY GREEGREE, ADDED DONATOR STATUS AND FIXED LOOOOOOAADS OF BUGSS[/size]
[size=12pt]11TH MAY: ADDED PJ TIMER AND FIXED SOME SMALL GLITCHES[/size]
[size=12pt]10TH MAY: WHEN KILLING SOMEONE YOU REGAIN FULL SPECIAL, ADDED MORE STUFF TO THE QUEST TAB, IMPROVED DARK BOW SPECIAL, FIXED CRYSTAL BOW DISCONNECT GLITCH[/size]
[size=12pt]9TH MAY: FIXED ANCIENT/LUNAR TELES AND ADDED MORE TRAINING AREAS AND BOSSES TO DEFEAT[/size]
[size=12pt][b]Here are the features that edgeville pking had.[/b][/size] [code]1) Fixed Xlog 2) Improved range following 3) Full melee following 4) Perfect Combat 5) All the latest 474 animations 6) Perfect dharok and verac effect 7) Modern Ancient Magic Hovering 8) PvP Point system 9) Kill row system, EG kill more then one person in a row and you get bonus points. 10) Ranks system, you gain a title on ::yell dependant on the amount of kills you have. Eg if you had 50 kills on and you yelled it would say ("Playername, Officer:") 11) PvP timer like runescape 12) Fixed PvP timer bug against NPC's 13) Awesome ranging timers without overpowered 14) PvP Drops system (1/100 Chance to gain an additional drop) 15) Amazing dark bow with perfect special 16) Perfect rushing with barrage 17) Improved graphical interfaces via client 18) Amazing claw special with graphics 19) OLDSCHOOL Combat 20) OLDSCHOOL Hp Bars 21) Equipment Interface, Client sided 22) Opening highscores via equipment tab 23) Full highscore system 24) Full SKULLING System 25) Awesome PK'ing[/code]
[b]Here are the features that ive added[/b] [code]1) I added arrow drops on NPC's and players 2) I've completely revamped the combat system 3) I have added a perfect skulling system 4) I removed every bug that was in edgeville pking 5) I've edited the client to an excessive level 6) Ive changed the PvP Store, so it no longer relies on value (so you can now protect pvp items using protect prayer) 7) I've added full headicons in compatibility with skulls 8) Ive edited all item.cfg stats to be perfect 9) Ive added my own anti autoer protection (UNIQUE) that randomises and isnt like others. 10) Ive changed the PvP point system, added killing ratios, deaths and fixed all possible ways of farming. 11) Ive made everything more accessable, changing all drops for KBD and chaos ele and added new bosses. As well as adding most new maps 12) KBD shoots out different types of magic, as does chaos elemental. 13) Ive edited almost all shops so the economy will improve 14) Ive edited how the prayer system works 15) Ive added piety and chivalry 16) Ive changed all timers for items, making them exactly like runescapes. 17) Ive edited the equipment screen so it isnt as rubbish as it was when i added it on edgeville pking 18) Ive added multi barrage 19) Ive cleaned up almost all code available, making it hold instead of 10 players up to 190 players without lagg on a small vps 20) Ive fixed random prayer draining when people die 21) Ive fixed the keeping three items if 0 pray glitch 22) Ive added defence reset 23) Ive added exp lock 24) I moved ALL commands to the quest tab 25) Ive added rules and defence reset and exp lock to the quest tab 26) Ive added kills and deaths, with correct ratios 27) I changed the highscores to kills, not points. 28) I added a bandage table where people could heal themselves 29) I edited kill messages so they align exactly with runescapes 30) I stopped ALL syis and nulls on the server, 100% uptime. 31) I added my entirely own punishment system, that stops ALL glitchers. 32) I edited dbow spec so it didnt suck balls 33) I changed the bolt effects so they were correct 34) I added entirely my own random choice system, unlike almost all other servers 35) I added fully working brews 36) Stopped gay pjing[/code]
I really [b]dislike commands[/b], so I decided to move all commands or anything that players could possibly want to type on a usual basis into the [b]quest tab[/b].
[font=impact][size=18pt][b]Picture of the all famous quest tab:[/b][/size][/font] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/fns4d2.png[/img]
I created my own random event system. Its much more effective then the current ones delta usually has. Basically, on a random timer a randomised screen comes up with a random sequence and a correct answer, if you click the incorrect one (IE your auto-clicking and it clicks it), you are disconnected.
While if you click through it (like some 1millisecond per click auto-clickers can do) which is when you click it and it doesn't process it fast enough, so it disappears instantly, it simply blocks you from clicking stalls until you re-log, once again stopping auto-clickers.
As this is based on random sequences, there is no way an autoclicker could get past it
[font=Impact][size=18pt][b]Heres some pictures of my random event system:[/b][/size][/font] Theiving: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/29zoguu.png[/img]
The random sequence is generated: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2hwz3no.png[/img]
Clicking on the correct one gives you 100k: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2gua89i.png[/img]
And the incorrect one disconnects you.
[font=impact][size=18pt][b]Punishment system[/b][/size][/font]
My own personal punishment system, or "the shame room" as i like to call it. is an ultimate combination of embarrassment, pissing people off and the already used jail in most deltas:
First of all you type the following command, with the players name afterwards. [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2gua89i.png[/img]
The person you punished is put in the shame room. A logout button is placed in the top left, and all tabs on the right are disabled. They are also muted.
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/250nigh.png[/img]
Not only this, but 13 guards also abuse them verbally. [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/1zvdafs.png[/img]
[b]I'll post pictures of the rest of the stuff ive said i developed if people don't believe me, but i assure you, it is done. Thanks for reading, post feedback and try to read what ive said before you post ;-D[/b]
